name: Tetris Clone (DuckPondGames)
description:
A simple, relaxing version of the classic video game, Tetris. How long will you last?

Originally created by me on 10/21 as a learning project to better understand mobile game development. This project was guided by the Udemy course: "Make Tetris-syle Puzzler" by Wilmer Lin. 

In the browser, use the arrows to play: left and right arrow move the piece, down arrow speeds it's decent, and up arrow rotates it. All other buttons can be clicked with your mouse.

In the android build: Swipe left and right to move the piece, swipe and hold down to speed it's decent, and tap the screen to rotate it.
